title.rendered: N’Style Atlanta Reveals Its Fashion Pick of the Week: Armenian Fashion Designer Lolarim

content.rendered:
Lolarim Reveals Engagement to BMG International Rap Star Super Sako

ATLANTA - October 12, 2022 - (Newswire.com)

Thirty-two-year-old Armenian fashion designer Lolarim reveals in a Q&A with nstyleatlanta.com that she's newly engaged to Armenian rap star Super Sako and working on expanding her brand to become a global fashion icon. 

Born in Armenia, Lolarim was raised in Cyprus, an island country in the eastern Mediterranean Sea south of the Anatolian Peninsula. Lolarim can remember being a young child doodling drawings of girls wearing different clothing, a passion she later developed into a skill, creating a fashion line called LAFRETI. When asked what her goals are for the two-year-old fashion line, Lolarim replied, "I want to take the brand worldwide and make a big impact in the global fashion world."

In the article, Lolarim also reveals she is newly engaged to BMG's first Armenian rapper Super Sako.

To read the full article on Lolarim, visit nstyleatlanta.com. 

Follow Lolarim on Instagram at @lolarim and her fashion line at @lafreti.

About N'Style Atlanta

N'Style Atlanta is the leading local authority for fashion, lifestyle, and entertainment news. Featuring a bold combination of thoughtful commentary from female voices, a sophisticated editorial approach, and in-depth coverage of Atlanta's social scene, N'Style inspires a fresh take on city living with our show N'Style Atlanta Uncut, currently streaming on the Fox network.


Contact Information:
Content Manager
info@nstyleatlanta.com

IMG_5820.jpg



Press Release Service by Newswire.com

Original Source: N'Style Atlanta Reveals Its Fashion Pick of the Week: Armenian Fashion Designer Lolarim
